mapper.select: select r.*, t1.team_name as winner_team_name, t2.team_name as loser_team_name, s.game_date as match_date from record r left outer join team t1 on r.winner_team_id=t1.id left outer join team t2 on r.loser_team_id=t2.id left outer join match m on r.match_id=m.id left outer join schedule s on m.schedule_id=s.id where winner_team_id=#{teamId} OR loser_team_id=#{teamId}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN winner_team_id = #{teamId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wincount, SUM(CASE WHEN loser_team_id = #{teamId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS losecount FROM record WHERE winner_team_id = #{teamId} OR loser_team_id = #{teamId}
